message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.NE, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a novel approach based on deep reinforcement learning for obtaining an ordering for tightening the bounds obtained with relaxed and restricted decision diagrams (DDs) for discrete optimization problems. This involves applying machine learning to directly improve relaxation bounds obtained by general-purpose bounding mechanisms for combinatorial optimization problems. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
